session_summary: Documentation Tagging Protocol creation, Phase 2A Infrastructure Refactoring service modules created, TradingRobotPlug.com deployments (stock prices fix + dashboard API), Phase 2B assessment started, Agent-6 coordinate mapping.

completed_tasks.description: Created comprehensive protocol for SSOT domain tags, navigation links, and cross-references across documentation and code. Protocol includes 12 sections covering tagging standards, navigation links, code file cross-references, documentation indexing, file organization, agent workspace links, implementation guidelines, discovery tools, validation checklists, examples, maintenance, and integration points.

completed_tasks.task: Phase 2A Infrastructure Refactoring - Service Module Creation
completed_tasks.description: Created 4 service modules extracted from messaging_pyautogui.py following Service Layer pattern. Services: CoordinateRoutingService (coordinate selection), MessageFormattingService (message formatting with get_message_tag/format_c2a_message moved), ClipboardService (thread-safe clipboard operations), PyAutoGUIOperationsService (PyAutoGUI operations). Integration started (imports added, services initialized). Complex integration requires focused session to complete safely.

Coordinated with Agent-2 to deploy front-page.php with dynamic JavaScript/AJAX stock prices and dashboard-api.php backend bug fix. Deployment successful via existing deployment tool. REST API endpoints verified PASS (6/6 accessible). Real-time stock data updates every 30 seconds from /tradingrobotplug/v1/stock-data endpoint.

Assessed messaging_template_texts.py (947 lines) for Configuration/Data pattern refactoring. File structure reviewed: 0 classes, 2 public functions, primarily template strings and configuration data. Determining refactoring approach.
Agent-6 coordinates updated in cursor_agent_coords.json SSOT file. Chat coordinates: [1619, 420], Onboarding coordinates: [1612, 371].

scope_completed: Documentation Tagging and Navigation Protocol created and indexed
decisions_made: Phase 2A integration requires focused incremental approach with testing after each step
Documentation Tagging Protocol uses SSOT domain tags as base, adds navigation links and cross-references
TradingRobotPlug deployments use existing deployment tools (deploy_tradingrobotplug_theme_now.py)
tradeoffs: Phase 2A: Service modules created but integration deferred to focused session due to complexity (200+ lines coordinate routing, 90+ lines formatting logic)
Documentation Protocol: Comprehensive protocol created but tooling for automated validation deferred to future work

agent_2.task: TradingRobotPlug.com stock prices deployment - Agent-2 validated implementation, Agent-3 executed deployment

knowledge_transfers.documentation_tagging_protocol: Protocol establishes standards for SSOT domain tags (format, placement, examples), navigation links (internal, cross-references, section links), code file cross-references (docstring links, import comments), documentation indexing standards, file organization tags, agent workspace links, implementation guidelines, discovery tools, validation checklists, examples, maintenance, and integration points.
knowledge_transfers.phase2a_service_layer: Service Layer pattern applied to messaging_pyautogui.py by extracting coordinate routing, message formatting, clipboard operations, and PyAutoGUI operations into dedicated service modules. Integration requires careful incremental replacement with testing to maintain backward compatibility.
knowledge_transfers.tradingrobotplug_deployment: TradingRobotPlug.com deployments executed via deploy_tradingrobotplug_theme_now.py. Dynamic stock prices implemented with JavaScript/AJAX fetch to REST API endpoint /tradingrobotplug/v1/stock-data. Real-time updates every 30 seconds.
